snippet.title: Creature Venture walkthrough (Apple II - Highland Computer Service)
snippet.description:
Creature Venture (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/creature-venture) was a graphics adventure game published by Highland Computer Service in 1981 for the Apple ][. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Walkthrough - www.solutionarchive.com (Dorothy Millard)
Disk image - A2 Canada
